definition: hair/feather/down/wool/mildew/mold/coarse or semifinished/young/raw/careless/unthinking/nervous/scared/(of currency) to devalue or depreciate/classifier for Chinese fractional monetary unit ( = 角[jiao3] , = one-tenth of a yuan or 10 fen 分[fen1])
(phonetic character used in transliteration of foreign names)/Taiwan pr. [li4]/variant of 璃[li2]

sentences.english: Incubation bottles with ground-glass stoppers are utilized.
sentences.chinese: 使用带毛玻璃塞子的培养瓶。

sentences.english: HRCT shows ill defined nodular areas of ground-glass opacity in the lung periphery.
sentences.chinese: HRCT显示肺外带边界不清的结节形毛玻璃样阴影。

sentences.english: At a more cephalad level, patchy consolidation and ground-glass opacity are visible.
sentences.chinese: 在近头侧层面，可见斑片状实变和毛玻璃样影。

sentences.english: Ground-glass opacity may be seen, due to numerous small granulomas .
sentences.chinese: 在大量的小结节区有时可见毛玻璃样阴影。

sentences.english: These walls, often made of frosted glass, are known locally as "Zion curtains".
sentences.chinese: 这种毛玻璃屏障被当地人称作“摩门教屏障”。

sentences.english: It's almost like using the ground-glass screen of a view-camera.
sentences.chinese: 这几乎就像使用视图的相机毛玻璃屏幕。

definition: variant of 百葉窗|百叶窗[bai3 ye4 chuang1]
